description: Update a cost code trucking cost summary.
permissions: Admins can update summaries. Managers who are members of the broker can update summaries for that broker.
side_effects: None (updates are rejected because summaries are immutable).
validation_notes: Summary ID argument is required. At least one of broker, start-on, or end-on must be provided. Updates are rejected because summaries are immutable.

flags.name: --start-on
flags.validation: Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

flags.name: --end-on
flags.validation: Must be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format and on/after start-on.
